p: Fifty stool samples were collected from 10 allo-HSCT recipients at different times from Beijing University First Hospital from February 2018 to March 2019. The stool specimens were transported on dry ice and stored at −80°C. Informed consent for fecal sample analysis was obtained from the patients or their legal guardians. The study protocol was approved by the Ethics Committee of the National Institute for Viral Disease Control and Prevention, China Center for Disease Control, according to Chinese ethics laws and regulations (IVDC2017-003).
